name: BUILDING DREAMS FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Building Dreams Foundation is a non-profit benevolent organization aimed towards philanthropic endeavors and aims to improve the lives of children, the elderly and the society as a whole. The organization is mainly focused on the betterment of education and the organization works to improve the quality of education that many underprivileged children cannot afford. There are educational programs for kids, activities, and competitions that strive to give children beyond what is promised by the academics and books. All the children from different sections of the society are welcomed into our classroom.Education that helps the people stand on their own feet. That is what Building Dreams Strive for in short.
